heading: Launching Into Cyber Security
outcome: Describe when to use qualitative and quantitative risk assessments.
Create threat models for various scenarios.
Design and explain DR strategies and solutions.

units.title: Unit 1

details.activity:
Collaborative Learning Discussion 1

Discussion Topic

Based on your reading of the case study(Kovaitė and Stankevičienė, 2019) answer the following questions in the discussion forum:
  • What do the authors mean by the term ‘Industry 4.0’ - give two examples.
  • Give two real-world examples of risks that fit into the authors categories.
  • Find another journal article that either supports or contradicts the points made in the cited study.

outcome: Discuss the various definitions of risk.
Explain how to assess, qualify and mitigate risks.
Describe various approaches to quantify and qualify risks.
List common security and risk standards and select the appropriate one(s) for a given situation.

units.title: Unit 2

details.activity:
Activity

Title: User Participation in the Risk Management Process. This activity analyzes the research paper written by Spears & Barki (2010) article and the use of qualitative and quantitative risk analysis methods used in the articles. In addition, also the impact of user participation in the risk analysis process is reviewed.

outcome: Discuss the differences between assessment approaches (Qualitative vs. Quantitative).
Explain the importance of user participation in the risk management process.
Discuss the implications of any recommended mitigations.

Team Meeting: Drafted Team Contract

As the module consists of few group assigment the team members assigned joined a virtual meet to draft our first team contract. This team contract describes the commitments and goals each member agreed upon.

outcome: Describe a number of threat modelling techniques.
Advise which technique should be used in specific situations.
Discuss when techniques should be combined in a hybrid model.
